decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).

| The outbuilding shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling, at no.11 Foster Road and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No kitchen or cooking facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated) - section 12, Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
description: Alterations to side and rear elevation doors and fenestration; erection of single storey ground floor extension to rear with a roof-light; loft conversion including formation of dormer windows to main roof at rear and side; installation of one roof-light to the rear closet wing hipped roof at the rear, three roof-lights to main roof level at the front, Single storey detached garden outbuilding
